title: Kuzu De Baka Ni Wa Nido To Awanai
alternative_title: ⚣ クズでバカには二度と会わな ; I’ll never meet with such a scumbag and an idiot like him again
status: ⚣ クズでバカには二度と会わな ; I’ll never meet with such a scumbag and an idiot like him again
description:
Description :
        Minami Yuuya meets an old friend from High School, Suzuka Sougo during a job request. Suzuka Sougo agrees, but at what cost?? Will the old feelings that Minami had come back, or will he be forced into blackmail? How long will these two HATE each other… from Fujoshi Bitches
